txt.en: Dwarves loyal to the Captain of the Pit can be found within Anglach: The Great Foundry.\n\nYou should defeat Dwarf-forgeworkers and their leaders.
Dwarves loyal to the Captain of the Pit have been seen within Anglach, aiding his war machine.

A note hangs from the board, signed by Mulnír:
 
'Dwarves have been seen entering Anglach with a host of Orcs and goblins. They must be loyal to the Captain of the Pit, and are surely aiding in the re-building of his war machine. I need someone to enter the foundry and defeat their leaders. Seek out Candúr at the Udûn Foothold for passage into Anglach.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Anglach: The Great Foundry to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
